mutants.code:
def find_minimum_colors_and_array(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for i in range(T):
        (N, K) = test_cases[i]
        rem = N * K
        rep = N // K
        even = rem // rep
        dis = rem % rep
        ex = rep - dis
        X = K + even + min(dis, 1)
        cycle = list(range(1, X + 1))
        extra = list(range(1, K + even + 1))
        carr = cycle * dis + extra * ex
        results.append((X, carr))
    return results

    results = []

        rep = N // K
        even = rem // rep
        dis = rem % rep
        ex = rep - dis
        X = K + even + min(dis, 1)
        cycle = list(range(1, X + 1))
        extra = list(range(1, K + even + 1))
        carr = cycle * dis + extra * ex
        results.append((X, carr))
    return results
